    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"

>
[Basic Red Mantis Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=896) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 71 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=17)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13); [Red Mantis Assassin Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=895)

</column>

---

You have learned limited divine magic from your Red Mantis training. You gain the [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=72) activity. You’re a prepared spellcaster, able to prepare two cantrips and one 1st-level spell each day. You prepare these spells from a Red Mantis assassin spellbook, similar to a wizard’s, containing three cantrips and two 1st-level spells. All the spells in your Red Mantis assassin spellbook, from this and later feats, must be either transmutation or illusion spells from the arcane spell list or a spell from the following list: [_clairaudience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), [_clairvoyance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [_modify memory_](/Spells.aspx?ID=200), [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345). Regardless of their usual magical tradition, your Red Mantis assassin spells are divine spells, as are any Red Mantis focus spells you gain.

 You can prepare two cantrips and one 1st-level spell each day from those found in your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You’re trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for casting divine spells. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

<title level="2">Basic Red Mantis Magic leads to...</title>
[Achaekek's Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=2162), [Advanced Red Mantis Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=897), [Mantis Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=899)
